sentences.en: Business usually slacks off at this time of the year.
sentences.cn: 每年这个时候生意一般都很清淡.

sentences.en: He wore his cleanest slacks, a clean shirt and a navy blazer.
sentences.cn: 他穿着他最干净的便裤，洁净的衬衫和藏青色上装。

sentences.en: He wore his swimsuit underneath his slacks.
sentences.cn: 他在运动服里面衬着游泳衣.

sentences.en: I put on a pair of golfing slacks.
sentences.cn: 我穿上了一条高尔夫球宽松裤.

sentences.en: I saw some slacks I like in the Sears catalogue.
sentences.cn: 我在西尔斯商品目录看中了几条便裤.

sentences.en: If someone slacks off, Bill comes down hard.
sentences.cn: 如果有人怠工，比尔就会严厉地加以斥责。

sentences.en: Johnson was clad casually in slacks and a light blue golf shirt.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊身穿休闲宽松的长裤，配以淡蓝色高尔夫衬衫。

sentences.en: People wear slacks, sweaters, flat shoes, and all manner of casual attire for travel.
sentences.cn: 人们穿着宽松的长裤、运动衫、平底鞋和各式适合旅行的休闲服装。

sentences.en: Retail business slacks down when employment drops.
sentences.cn: 就业率低时零售业就不景气.

sentences.en: She was wearing black slacks and a white sweater.
sentences.cn: 她身穿黑色便裤和白色毛衣。

sentences.en: She was wearing blue linen slacks and a matching silk shirt.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一条蓝色的亚麻布便裤,配着一件绸衬衫.

sentences.en: She was wearing wool slacks and a paisley smock.
sentences.cn: 她穿着羊毛宽松裤和涡旋花纹宽袍。

sentences.en: That morning I had put on a pair of black slacks and a long-sleeved black blouse.
sentences.cn: 那天早上，我穿了一条宽松的黑裤子和一件长袖黑衬衫。

sentences.en: The slacks have an elastic waistband.
sentences.cn: 这条便裤的腰带可伸缩.
